title: Sidewall, 1840–70
description: On ungrounded off-white paper, imitation moire effect is printed in gray, with a wide floral stripe in two shades of pink, two shades of lavender, blue, two shades of green ochre, and black, alternating with a narrow stripe, a twisted lavender ribbon dotted with ochre bandings along the edge interrupted by tiny sprigs of two pink roses at approximately 4 inch intervals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1840–70.
1840–70. Machine-printed, machine made paper, ungrounded. Gift of Delafield, Hope & Linker. 1974-81-13-a,b.
